name: StartupCraft Inc
tagline: We marry brilliant ideas with technology
description:
StartupCraft is a Blockchain, Web and Mobile app development company focused on building products and solutions for startups of any calibre and Enterprise companies. Learn about how we can help with your project.
We enjoy working on unique and challenging tasks, not wasting our time on routine. It helps keep our brains always in shape and drive us to get up in every morning. It leads engineering mind to work with compassion and discover high-quality code formulae. Open Source only teases with a solution and in the end, it isn't ready for real production experience. By investing thousands of hours when developing our own reusable system we never reinvent the wheel.
To craft a startup one has to balance between routine and innovation, so we prefer to bring a maximum of our time and intellectual resources to your unique business idea. Â We offer our smart economy product development process and welcome to join a startup craft journey.
More info here: https://startupcraft.io
